compass¶

Defines

AVERAGE_FILTER_SIZE¶

Set the number of samples for average filtering

default 30

EEPROM_CALIBRATION_ADDRESS¶

Set the EEPROM start address where the calibration value is stored

default 0

CALIBRATION_TIME¶

Set the time required for calibration values to stabilize

uinit millisecond， default 3000

AVERAGE_FILTER¶

Whether to turn on the average filter

default true

Functions

void compassBegin()¶

Compass init.

int16_t compassReadAngle()¶

Read the average filtered value of compass angle.

Returns

int16_t average angle

int16_t compassGetAzimuth()¶

Calculate the angle from the values in the x, y direction of the compass sensor.

Returns

int16_t angle

void compassCalibrateStart()¶

Start calibrate compass.

bool compassCalibrateLoop()¶

The loop of compass calibration.

bool compassCalibrateDone()¶

Is compass Calibrate Done ?

Returns

true

Returns

false
